name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
Like every day, I woke up late after having nightmares about that terrible day. I quickly prepared everything and ran to school while still holding a piece of cake in my mouth. When arriving at school, a familiar figure was standing at the training ground, Seraphina Edora.
"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

Seraphina Edora crossed her arms and glared at you

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in Seraphina Edora's eyes
swipes:
Like every day, I woke up late after having nightmares about that terrible day. I quickly prepared everything and ran to school while still holding a piece of cake in my mouth. When arriving at school, a familiar figure was standing at the training ground, {{char}}.
"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

{{char}} crossed her arms and glared at you

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in {{char}}'s eyes

As the sun broke through the emerald canopy, illuminating the forest path, I noticed Seraphina, affectionately known as Sera, walking with purpose, albeit a little late. A mischievous urge overtook me, and I hurried away to catch up with her, a playful smirk dancing on your lips.

“Late again, Sera? What a lazy pig who loves to sleep!” I teased, unable to resist the opportunity to tease her.

Seraphina's reaction was immediate, she turned towards me. Even though she didn't like being teased, I couldn't help but be amused by her reaction.

“What's the matter with you, you idiot,” she replied, her tone carrying a hint of annoyance.

name: Cronos
mes: Stop in front of Sera I'm already late and you're still here teasing me, do you want us both to be late? I breathe heavily, put my hand on my kneesLook up at Sera I think I forgot to bring my schedule, can I borrow yours! I was in a hurry so I left it at home!

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Seraphina Edora rolls her eyes at Cronos' request, but she can't deny that she likes his company.*

*She takes out her schedule from the small bag that she always carries around and hands it over to Cronos.*

Take this, and stop making such a big deal out of it. You know I can't stand it when you act like a child. *She says with a sigh.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
swipes:
*Seraphina Edora rolls her eyes at Cronos' request, but she can't deny that she likes his company.*

*She takes out her schedule from the small bag that she always carries around and hands it over to Cronos.*

Take this, and stop making such a big deal out of it. You know I can't stand it when you act like a child. *She says with a sigh.*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Cronos
mes:
Damn, why didn't you tell me earlier that today we have basic Combat Skills class with Professor Gandoth! *I panicked when I looked at the schedule*
*I hurriedly grab Sera's hand and pull her* Hurry up, Sera, I don't want any more scars in the Student Book. I'm sure that grumpy old man will give me another scar if I'm late without any reason, Huh!

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Seraphina Edora pulls her hand away from Cronos, her face flushing with embarrassment.*

Hey! What do you think you're doing?! *She protests, trying to regain her composure.*

*She quickly recovers and starts walking towards the classroom, trying to ignore the warmth of Cronos' hand.*

Don't worry about it. We'll be late either way. *She mutters under her breath.*

*As they reach the classroom door, Seraphina Edora takes a deep breath and opens it.*

Let's go inside before Professor Gandoth starts lecturing and makes us regret being late. *She says quietly as they enter the room.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
swipes:
*Seraphina Edora pulls her hand away from Cronos, her face flushing with embarrassment.*

Hey! What do you think you're doing?! *She protests, trying to regain her composure.*

*She quickly recovers and starts walking towards the classroom, trying to ignore the warmth of Cronos' hand.*

Don't worry about it. We'll be late either way. *She mutters under her breath.*

*As they reach the classroom door, Seraphina Edora takes a deep breath and opens it.*

Let's go inside before Professor Gandoth starts lecturing and makes us regret being late. *She says quietly as they enter the room.*

*Seraphina Edora smirks at Cronos' panic-stricken face, and she gives his hand a light tug.*

Oh, baka, you're so dramatic. Professor Gandoth is not that scary. *She says with a teasing tone.*

*She starts walking faster to keep up with Cronos.*

Just relax and follow me. We can't afford to be late. *She adds with a reassuring smile.*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Cronos
mes: I tug at Sera's hand once more, giving her a wry smile and saying Listen! If he asks for a reason why we're late, you say it's because the Flock of Troublemakers swiped our bag and we had to chase after them to retrieve it, okay! I beg of you, I'll treat you to a meal after morning class, deal, kind and lovely Lady Sera?

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Seraphina Edora rolls her eyes at Cronos' antics, but she can't deny that she enjoys his company.*

Fine, fine. I'll do it for you. But only because I owe you after saving my life a decade ago. *She mutters under her breath.*

*She gives Cronos a stern look before opening the classroom door.*

Let's hope Professor Gandoth doesn't notice our little game. *She says as they enter the room.*

*As they take their seats, Seraphina Edora can't help but think about how much she enjoys these small moments with Cronos. Despite their rough start, they seem to have formed a bond that neither of them can deny.*

*He then turns to Sera.*

*Professor Gandoth smirks as he watches Cronos get hit by his sword strikes.*

That's the spirit, Jisyll. *He says, his voice filled with satisfaction.*

*He then turns to Sera.*

And you, Miss Edora, pay attention. *He says, his eyes filled with amusement.*

*He then turns back to Cronos.*

Now, stand up and continue the duel. *He says, his voice filled with authority.*

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
*Leaning the wooden sword on the ground and standing up* Alright Professor, I'm going to change my technique now, be careful.
*Point the sword to the waist and lower the body down, close the eyes and focus on the breath*
Moon Pledge: Bottom Moon Reflection.

name: Professor Gandoth
mes:
*Professor Gandoth blinks in surprise as he sees Cronos's new technique.*

Interesting... *He says, his voice filled with curiosity.*

*He then charges at Cronos again, his sword gleaming in the light.*

Sword Sect: Four-Sided Sword. *He says, his voice filled with determination.*

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
*As the professor charges in to strike, I calmly keep my sword at my waist. But as his four-sided strike is almost upon me, I instantly disappear and reappear 
 a distance behind him, unleashing a crescent-shaped sword attack towards the professor.*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Professor Gandoth
mes:
*Professor Gandoth blinks in surprise as Cronos disappears and reappears behind him, his eyes filled with shock.*

You... *He says, his voice filled with disbelief.*

*He then spins around and parries Cronos's attack.*

Not bad, Jisyll. *He says, his voice filled with admiration.*

*He then charges at Cronos again, his sword gleaming in the light.*

Sword Sect: Five-Sided Sword. *He says, his voice filled with determination.*

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
*Once again, I blink my eyes and hold the sword with one hand at my waist, as the professor's swords attack me, I open my eyes* Moonlight Decree: Sword Breaking Art
*My sword transforms into a sharp crescent-shaped blade that shatters the professor's wooden swords, sending him stumbling backwards. I immediately charge at him and swing a sword strike towards his head* Moonlight Decree: Illusionary Light Life Seize
*A terrifying killing intent radiates from me. But as my sword swings towards his forehead, I abruptly stop, creating a powerful gust of wind blowing away. The sword stops just in front of the professor's nose*.

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Professor Gandoth
mes:
*Professor Gandoth blinks in surprise as Cronos's attack stops just in front of his face, his eyes filled with amazement.*

Remarkable... *He says, his voice filled with respect.*

This is why you are known as the Ultimate Genius Child. *His words trail off as he recollects their past encounters and losses.*

swipes:

Impressive... *He says, his voice filled with admiration.*

*He then quickly steps back and creates a shield of energy around himself.*

Well done, Jisyll. *He says, his voice filled with pride.*

*Professor Gandoth blinks in surprise as Cronos's attack stops just in front of his face, his eyes filled with amazement.*

Remarkable... *He says, his voice filled with respect.*

This is why you are known as the Ultimate Genius Child. *His words trail off as he recollects their past encounters and losses.*

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes: *I quickly sheath my sword and help the professor up* I apologize for going overboard, but what did you mean by calling me the Ultimate Genius Child?

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Professor Gandoth
mes:
*Professor Gandoth sighs, his eyes filled with regret.*

I've always been hard on you, Jisyll. *He says, his voice filled with remorse.*

I was just too proud of my own abilities and didn't want to acknowledge that there could be someone better than me. *He says, his eyes filled with regret.*

But you're not just good. You're great. *His words trail off as he gazes at Cronos with respect.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

swipes:
*Professor Gandoth smirks as he helps Cronos up, his eyes filled with satisfaction.*

Just watch your own actions, Jisyll. *He says, his voice filled with amusement.* You keep surprising me. And it's not just about skills or fighting prowess. It's more than that. You are unpredictable and fast-thinking, which makes you dangerous. You can even control the power of wind with your weapons, no less! That takes a great deal of skill.

But back to what I said... *He finally continues, his gaze intense.* You are indeed an exceptional child. People might see your arrogance or your careless attitude. They might see your recklessness or disregard for rules. However, once they actually witness your strength, it becomes evident that you are a genius who can surpass any challenge. Hence, the term 'Ultimate Genius Child'. Now remember, with such power comes responsibility. So let's take this seriously next time, shall we?

*Professor Gandoth sighs, his eyes filled with regret.*

I've always been hard on you, Jisyll. *He says, his voice filled with remorse.*

I was just too proud of my own abilities and didn't want to acknowledge that there could be someone better than me. *He says, his eyes filled with regret.*

But you're not just good. You're great. *His words trail off as he gazes at Cronos with respect.*

*Professor Gandoth looks at Cronos, his eyes filled with pride and respect.* You have indeed exceeded all expectations, even those held by your father and me. *His words carry profound meaning as he reflects back on the lessons he has taught Cronos over the years.*

But there is still much for you to learn. Do not become complacent due to your natural talent, for this path of becoming a Mystic Hunter is fraught with dangers and challenges that you must face head-on. *Despite the heavy burden of training Cronos, he stands tall with an assuring smile for his young pupil.*

name: Professor Gandoth
mes: "But how did you learn those skills? Those are Advanced Skills that only Veteran Hunters would know." *I ask Cronos in surprise.*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Cronos
mes:
*Cronos chuckles softly, running a hand through his hair.*

Well, it's a long story, Professor. *He starts, his voice filled with nostalgia.*

It all started when I was still a child. My mother died during the fourth Mysterious Beast Invasion, and I blamed my father for it. So I ran away from home and joined the MysHunter Academy. *His gaze softens as he remembers his past.*

There, I met some amazing people who taught me everything they knew. They were all veterans themselves, and they took me under their wing. *He smiles fondly.*

They taught me not just combat skills but also life lessons. It wasn't easy, but I learned fast because of my natural talent. *His smile fades slightly.*

But even though I became strong enough to fight alongside them against the beasts, something happened that changed everything. *His eyes darken as he recalls the memory.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

swipes:
*Cronos shrugs, his eyes filled with a mix of pride and embarrassment.*

Well, I guess it's because I'm a genius. *He says, his voice filled with amusement.*

I've always had a knack for picking up new skills quickly. *He says, his eyes filled with pride.*

But don't worry, I won't show off my skills all the time. *He says, his voice filled with sincerity.*

I see, Advanced Skills. It seems we both underestimated your talent. You learned Advanced Skills while you were recovering, and I was going on adventures! I admit I'm proud and happy for you. Your determination reminds me of my younger self. I used to be driven to always improve. My injury reminds me that my ambition alone won’t get the job done. Sometimes we need help from others or wisdom passed down from the older generation, just like you, Gandoth, who taught me not to be arrogant." I say to Professor Gandoth, leaning my weapon on the ground beside us. I sigh in reflection before breaking the silence that followed my words. I know better now, no longer overestimating what I’m capable of doing or underestimating the skills of my companions, or dismissing those who have been on this road before. In the end, knowledge is gained by sharing experiences among each other. With that in mind, I'm going to return to my daily routine. Do well at your duties, Professor Gandoth. *I say this as I start walking towards my dorms*

*Cronos chuckles softly, running a hand through his hair.*

Well, it's a long story, Professor. *He starts, his voice filled with nostalgia.*

It all started when I was still a child. My mother died during the fourth Mysterious Beast Invasion, and I blamed my father for it. So I ran away from home and joined the MysHunter Academy. *His gaze softens as he remembers his past.*

There, I met some amazing people who taught me everything they knew. They were all veterans themselves, and they took me under their wing. *He smiles fondly.*

They taught me not just combat skills but also life lessons. It wasn't easy, but I learned fast because of my natural talent. *His smile fades slightly.*

But even though I became strong enough to fight alongside them against the beasts, something happened that changed everything. *His eyes darken as he recalls the memory.*
